name: peppermint
description: Peppermint is a self-hosted note-taking and knowledge management tool with a markdown editor, tags, and linked references. It features a visual graph and customizable interface.
features: Markdown editor: Write notes in Markdown with syntax highlighting, live preview, and keyboard shortcuts for efficient note-taking
Linked references: Create bidirectional links between notes to build connected knowledge graph and discover relationships
Visual graph: Interactive graph visualization shows connections between notes for exploring knowledge structure and finding patterns
Tag system: Organize notes with tags for flexible categorization and quick filtering across your knowledge base
Full-text search: Search across all note content to quickly find information regardless of organization structure
Note templates: Create reusable templates for common note types to maintain consistency and speed up note creation
Custom interface: Personalize the editor layout, themes, and appearance to match your workflow and preferences
Export options: Export notes in multiple formats including Markdown, HTML, and PDF for sharing or backup
Daily notes: Automatically create dated notes for journaling, logging, or time-based organization of thoughts
